actions.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Byrne.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-19 to clarify that the "any other factor other than sex" defense in the Equal Pay Act means a bona fide business-related reason other than sex, and to strike Section 3(a)(B) relating to the application of the factor other than sex defense to an Equal Pay Act claim.
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-19 to clarify that the "any other factor other than sex" defense in the Equal Pay Act means a bona fide business-related reason other than sex, and to strike Section 3(a)(B) relating to the application of the factor other than sex defense to an Equal Pay Act claim.
